name: Didn't Understand Question
description: Didn't understand what the question was asking you to do.

name: Misread the Question
description: Generally knew what the problem was asking but misread a key detail in the question or text.

name: Time Pressure
description: Entered a guess as time was running out.

name: Calculation Error
description: Knew how to solve the problem, but made a small mistake in calculation.

name: Lack of Knowledge
description: Didn't know or forgot a key piece of information or formula needed to solve.

name: Careless Mistake
description: Knew how to solve the problem, but made a small slip-up, like a sign error or typo.

name: Used Wrong Strategy
description: Knew what the problem was asking, but chose the wrong strategy to solve it.

name: Guessed
description: Made a random guess without a clear strategy or understanding.

name: Others
description: Category for when none of the other options apply.
